name: sample
description: control or flood turmeric plant, and which biological replicate

name: leaf_id
description: which leaf that was analyzed from the same control or flood turmeric plant

name: treatment
description: whether the turmeric was kept as a control, or flooded

name: abs
description: wavelength of absorbance measurement at either 645 nm or 663 nm

name: chloro_undil
description: absorbance measuremeants at 645 nm and 663 nm of undilted chlorophyll sample

name: chloro_dil
description: absorbance measuremeants at 645 nm and 663 nm of dilted chlorophyll sample
